title: Remote Wear for Roku
summary: Control your TV from your Android Wear smartwatch!
description: Remote Wear lets you control your Roku from your smartwatch! It connects your Roku and smartwatch through your mobile device. It consists of two parts - the phone app and the smartwatch app. In the phone app you can select which Roku device you want to control. You can control your Roku from both apps. You don't need a smartwatch to use the phone app.Quick Start: * Install the latest version of Android Wear from Google Play * This app requires Android Wear version 1.1.1.1889093 or above to work * Install Remote Wear app in your phone * It will automatically install the remote app in the paired smartwatches * Give it a few minutes for the smartwatch to install the remote app * You can verify the remote app in the smartwatch's Start menu * You can launch the remote in your smartwatch from the phone app * Connect your phone to the same Wi-Fi network as your Roku device * The phone app will detect the Roku devices in your network * Select the Roku device you want to control in the devices menu * Use the remote to control it from your phone app * Open the remote app in your smartwatch and control your Roku from your wrist!Upgrade to the Instant Watch Edition to control your Roku devices without ads or delays. In the free version, the phone app contains ads and the smartwatch app offers a 5 minute trial. After the trial period the watch app will delay sending the commands to your Roku. You can close the watch app by swiping right and start a new 5 minute trial! Help & FAQs: http://www.appestry.biz/roku-remote-wearThis app is not affiliated with Roku, Inc.
descriptionHTML:
Remote Wear lets you control your Roku from your smartwatch! It connects your Roku and smartwatch through your mobile device. It consists of two parts - the phone app and the smartwatch app. In the phone app you can select which Roku device you want to control. You can control your Roku from both apps. You don't need a smartwatch to use the phone app.

Quick Start:
* Install the latest version of Android Wear from Google Play
* This app requires Android Wear version 1.1.1.1889093 or above to work
* Install Remote Wear app in your phone
* It will automatically install the remote app in the paired smartwatches
* Give it a few minutes for the smartwatch to install the remote app
* You can verify the remote app in the smartwatch's Start menu
* You can launch the remote in your smartwatch from the phone app
* Connect your phone to the same Wi-Fi network as your Roku device
* The phone app will detect the Roku devices in your network
* Select the Roku device you want to control in the devices menu
* Use the remote to control it from your phone app
* Open the remote app in your smartwatch and control your Roku from your wrist!

Upgrade to the Instant Watch Edition to control your Roku devices without ads or delays. In the free version, the phone app contains ads and the smartwatch app offers a 5 minute trial. After the trial period the watch app will delay sending the commands to your Roku. You can close the watch app by swiping right and start a new 5 minute trial!

Help & FAQs: http://www.appestry.biz/roku-remote-wear

This app is not affiliated with Roku, Inc.
comments: Works just as well as the roku app. Doesn't have all the same bell's and whistles, but works great on my smart watch and is exactly what I was looking for
just keep saying phone not found. No support to help me resolve the issue. very disappointed, uninstalling!
I use this app almost exclusively when watching TV on Roku now when doing chores around the house. It's never failed to work once. Dependable! Practical! User-friendly! Really great smartwatch app.
Doesn't even read my Roku worst possible app I've ever had and I wish I could get a half hour of my life back wasting the time of downloading it
Very handy app. Even works on wear 2.0. when I'm on the phone I can pause or turn off my Roku. One of my favorite apps.

Wow. Really? This app is for a '5 minute free trial." After 5 minutes, the app purposefully delays the command sent to your Roku so you have to wait a few seconds before anything happens. Even with the dumb delay, it still didn't work. Garbage. Uninstall.
recentChanges: • Displays error messages in the watch
Thank you all for your feedback!
